thread.title: Media Advisory - Maple Leaf Foods Inc. 2018 First Quarter Financial Results Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Media Advisory - Maple Leaf Foods Inc. 2018 First Quarter Financial Results Conference Call

organizations.name: media advisory - maple leaf foods inc.

text:
TSX: MFI
www.mapleleaffoods.com
TORONTO, April 9, 2018 /PRNewswire/ - Maple Leaf Foods Inc. will report its financial results for the first quarter on May 2, 2018. The financial results will be released by CNW newswire service.
What :
Maple Leaf Foods 2018 First Quarter Financial Results Conference Call
Who :
Michael H. McCain, President and Chief Executive Officer
Debbie Simpson, Chief Financial Officer
When :
May 2, 2018 at 2:30pm. Eastern
Where :
Go to http://investor.mapleleaf.ca/ for webcast link
Live over the Internet -- Simply log on to the above link.
To participate via conference call, please call 416-340-2216 / 1-800-273-9672 . For those unable to participate, playback will be made available an hour after the event at 905-694-9451 / 1-800-408-3053, passcode: 9110367#.
If you are unable to participate, the webcast will be archived and available on the Company's website at www.mapleleaffoods.com under the Presentations & Webcasts section.
Maple Leaf Foods Inc. is a leading consumer protein company, making high quality, innovative products under national brands including Maple Leaf®, Maple Leaf Prime®, Maple Leaf Natural Selections®, Schneiders®, Schneiders® Country Naturals®, Mina®, Lightlife TM and Field Roast Grain Meat Co. TM . The Company employs approximately 11,500 people and does business in Canada, the U.S. and Asia. The Company is headquartered in Mississauga, Ontario and its shares trade on the Toronto Stock Exchange (MFI).
[(Minimum Requirements to listen to broadcast: The Windows Media Player software, downloadable free from https://www.microsoft.com/en-ca/download/windows-media-player-details.aspx and at least a 28.8Kbps connection to the Internet. If you experience problems listening to the broadcast, send an email to webcastsupport@tfprn.com ).]
SOURCE Maple Leaf Foods Inc.
